CustomField.description: This field is used for reporting on BDM.
CustomField.formula:
IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Account_Executive_1__c)), Account_Executive_1__r.FirstName +" "+ Account_Executive_1__r.LastName,"")+BR() +
IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Account_Executive_2__c)), Account_Executive_2__r.FirstName +" "+ Account_Executive_2__r.LastName, "")
CustomField.label: Business Development Manager
